{{cpp/title|make_error_condition{{small|(std::errc)}}}}
{{cpp/error/errc/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|system_error}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|
std::error_condition make_error_condition( std::errc e ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Creates an error condition for an {{tt|errc}} value {{c|e}}. Sets the error value to {{c|int(e)}} and error category to {{lc|std::generic_category}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|e|standard error value}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Error condition for {{c|e}}.

===Example===
{{example|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;
#include &lt;system_error&gt;

int main()
{
    auto err = std::make_error_condition(std::errc::invalid_argument);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; err.message() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
Invalid argument
}}
